Uses of Package
membership

Packages that use membership
hypership   
membership   
 

Classes in membership used by hypership
MSMain
          This is the main membership class, it handles all the information about the current membership.
MSMember
          This class encapsulates every information on a member : - Name of the member - State of the member - Address of the computer - Member Identifier
MSView
          This class implements the global view of the membership.
 

Classes in membership used by membership
MSController
          Interface for the controllers of membership capacities
MSControllerElection
          This controller handles the election procedure.
MSControllerGlobal
          This class implements the 1st-level service, used only by the ring leader MSControllerGlobal extends the MSControllerMulticast service by handling : - Reception of views from other group leaders on the 1st-level ring
MSControllerJoin
          This controller handles the join procedure for a newly arriving computer.
MSControllerLeader
          This controller handles the leader watching for faulty messages in order to broadcast the information to the ring.
MSControllerLocal
          This controller handles the leader watching of join and membership messages on the 2nd level ring.
MSControllerMember
          This controller handles the member watching of membership messages on the 2nd level ring.
MSControllerMulticast
          This abstract class encapsulates the basic functionality for a multicast controller.
MSControllerUnicastUDP
          This abstract class encapsulates the basic functionality for a UDP based controller.
MSMain
          This is the main membership class, it handles all the information about the current membership.
MSMember
          This class encapsulates every information on a member : - Name of the member - State of the member - Address of the computer - Member Identifier
MSMessage
          This class is a standard message of the membership which contains : - The type of the message - The sender of the message - The current membership view of the sender
MSTimeout
          This class implements the timeout functionality needed for the membership services.
MSView
          This class implements the global view of the membership.
MSViewLocal
          This class implements the local view of a membership 2nd level ring.
MSWatcherActive
          This class is the second-level active watcher.
MSWatcherActiveListener
          This class is the second-level active watcher answerer.
MSWatcherPassive
          This class is the first-level passive watcher.
WatchingStruct
          A simple class for storing the remaining time before a group fault.
